feed.subtitle: I am a developer, photography enthusiast, and self-proclaimed music connoisseur.This is where I write about awesome things that intrigue me.

entry.title: Simple Chat App with rethinkdb & pheonix
entry.content:
There is no official rethinkdb adapter for phoenix.But the community plug is very good and ready to be used in production.

This post illustrates how to create a simple chat application using phoenix and rethinkdb :

Simple Chat App in Elixir With Phoenix and RethinkDB
